subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Brandan Wright had 17 points on 8-of-10 shooting and No. 4 North Carolina recovered from the loss that knocked it from No. 1 with its sixth straight victory over No. 19 Clemson, 77-55, last night.
snippet: Brandan Wright had 17 points on 8-of-10 shooting and No. 4 North Carolina recovered from the loss that knocked it from No. 1 with its sixth straight victory over No. 19 Clemson, 77-55, last night.
